/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++  CMakeFiles/Sobel_Filter.dir/Image_filter.cu.o -o Sobel_Filter  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libopencv_gapi.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_ml.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_objdetect.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_photo.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_stitching.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_video.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_videoio.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_dnn.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgcodecs.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_calib3d.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_features2d.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_flann.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_imgproc.so.4.5.1 /usr/local/lib/libopencv_core.so.4.5.1  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
